place.name: BEUTIFUL TUSCAN DATACHED VILLA 20P
place.house_rules:
La villa viene affittata indipendente con piscina privata con le seguenti opzioni:
VILLA INDIPENDENTE fino a 10 persone in bassa e media stagione (5 camere matrimoniali con bagno/doccia)
VILLA INDIPENDENTE fino a 16 persone (9 camere con letti matrimoniali e 9 bagni/doccia)
VILLA INDIPENDENTE fino a 20 persone ( 11 camere con letti matrimoniali,9 bagni/doccia, 1 bagno con doccia e vasca idromassaggio, 1 bagno con doccia idromassaggio e cromoterapia)

E' possibile prenotare previa espressa conferma della disponibilità degli appartamenti.
La prenotazione prevede un acconto del 30% del totale (non rimborsabile in caso di annullamento), pagabile mediante bonifico bancario.
Il saldo verrà regolato all'arrivo presso "PODERE INCROCIATI" mediante carta di credito, bancomat o contanti.
Permanenze settimanali da sabato a sabato,date flessibili in bassa e media stagione.Deposito cauzionale euro 700.
Gli arrivi devono essere compresi fra le ore 16:00 e le ore 19:30 del sabato con termine entro le ore 09:30 del sabato successivo.
====================================================
The villa can be reserved as a whole building with private swimming pool, and it is possible to chose among the following availabilities:
whole building up to 10 people in low and middle season
whole building up to 16 people 
whole building up to 20 people .

A reservation is possible upon confirmation of the availability of the requested apartment.
Reservation requires 30% of the total amount on account (non-refundable for cancellations), which can be payed by bank transfer.
The payment has to be settled upon arrival to Podere Incrociati; banknotes, credit card accepted.
Weekly stays from Saturday to Saturday. Shorter and flexible stays are possible in low and middle season. 
Upon arrival we require a 700 Euro security deposit for possible damage that will be given back at departure. 
Check-in on Saturdays from 4:00 p.m. to 7:30 p.m.; check-out within 09:30 a.m. on the last scheduled Saturday.
place.description:
"PODERE INCROCIATI" rises in the heart of Montagnola Senese, just 15 km/9 miles far from Siena and 75 km/47,5 miles far from Florence, among the greenery of age-old oaks, holm-oaks and chestnut-trees. 
It is an ideal place to take a relaxing holiday far from the city din, among the peace of the country, in contact with an endless cultural heritage within a stone's throw from the sea and the most important Tuscan cities of art. 
Thanks to its high position (500 mt./1640 ft. above sea level) you will enjoy a well-aired summer suitable for walks in the nearby woods, crossed by several paths, catching sight of charming landscapes, lots of medieval villages and Romanesque parish churches. 
There are thousands of paths through Montagnola Senese, which is a hillock in the heart of the Sienese area. During the Middle Ages, these paths were connected to the ancient "Via Francigena", the important road link between Rome and the rest of Europe, and this is the reason why in this area there are so many old villages and churches. 
Podere Incrociati is surrounded by a natural environment, with tracks that go through the woods and that are ideal for mountain-bike, horse-back riding and trekking excursions, during which, with a little stroke of luck, it is possible to meet fallow-deer, badgers, foxes, porcupines, hedgehoges, dormice. 
The building is composed of a mansion built in 1840 during the Gran Duke Leopoldo II of Tuscany's reign, that has been recently restored, without altering its original characteristics.
The outside fronts have maintained their originality, while inside the building, most part of the ancient hand-crafted brick floors has been restored, as well as the ceilings with their old wooden beams that had been blackened by the smoke of the mantelpieces, which were once the only source of heating; the old irregular walls and the arched ceilings have been preserved, too. 
The old forniture makes the place comfortable and charming, respecting the ancient rural Sienese traditions. 
The place is particularly sunny thanks to a wide natural meadow that lays south of the building, alternating with the woods, and that is at the guests' disposal.

place.name: Toscana - Siena e la Val di Merse
place.description:
The Val di Merse is a road designed by Mother Nature whose fame is not attached to the myth of a name. 
In the world of communications where everything must have a label and where you travel following legendary and sometimes inconsistent goals, this land of Siena likes to introduce itself without a visiting card. It prefers a firm handshake and a glance that immediately inspire trust. 
It would be like expecting a formal presentation from someone who wants to say how fine he is inside!
The essence of a place, as of a person, is a discovery that comes about discreetly and silently. It’s a question of feeling; sometimes it happens in a flash, on other occasions you need more time.
The Val di Merse has a reserved character and travellers fall in love with it because it knows how to be at once shadowy and sunny. Its intimate purity and the intact solitude in which it lives are highly intriguing and are an exclusive invitation to the traveller who is motivated by discreet curiosity.
The green Val di Merse, with its water and its spread can be crossed in many ways, but to savor it more, it is advisable to do so by foot or on horseback, in order to experience the journey as an unforgettable experience.
Also the bike is one of the means that can be exploited to explore the valley, thanks to the many routes available to everyone, even families.

place.name: Agriturismo Amina 1
place.description:
Tipical ancient tuscan farmhouse, our setting is ideal for a relaxing holiday.
Our house is located just outside the Corsignano hamlet, only 7 kilometers far from Siena city centre, on the touristic route of Chianti Classico wine. Only 3 km from us is one of the most beautiful Chartreuse of Italy, the one of Pontignano, and in 30 km you will find important artistic and hystorical towns of Tuscany (Siena, San Gimignano, Volterra, Pienza, Montalcino, Castellina, Radda e Gaiole in Chianti). Florence is 55 Km far from Agriturismo Amina.
We offer five spacious and comfortable double bedrooms, fully-restored and furnished in very good taste. They are 25 mq large, with private bathroom, large king-size bed, sofa-bed, satellite Tv, small fridge, writing desk and terrace with table and chairs. Furthermore we place at guests disposal and free of charge: a panoramic swimming pool (13 X 5,5 m) with solarium, private covered parking, breakfast, cot for baby on demand, barbecue and an antique wood oven.
The price includes the breakfast, and children under 5 years old sleep free of charge.

place.name: Villa Righino
place.house_rules:
Il check in avviene dalle 16.00 in poi, il check out alle 10.00.
Sono ammessi animali di piccola taglia previo accordo con il proprietario.
place.description:
The villa is a new structure, with typical Tuscan cotto flooring. The large windows look out on the hilly landscape with Mount Amiata as a backdrop.

The well-lit living room is furnished with easy chairs, sofa bed and television. Dining room and kitchen are accessed from the living room and are well-equipped, including dishwasher and iron.

The two bedrooms can sleep from four to five people with the possibility for additional baby-bed. The bathroom is spacious with shower and washing machine.

In front there is a private yard with comfortable table and chairs in wrought iron for relaxing breakfasts and dinners in the open air.

Murlo is a small town located in the territory of antique Etruria, land of etruscans. Within walking distance it is possible to visit the etruscan museum and its related excavations of international recognition.

They are the perfect place for a relaxing vacation in contact with nature with frequent sightings of the animals that populate it. Villa Righino and La Casina are excellent for family vacations, offering culture, nature, and other recreational opportunities. Mountain-bike tours and trails for hiking are accessible in the immediate vicinity, as are ranches open to the public for amazing excursions on horseback.

place.name: La Capanna
place.description:
Our family is pleased to welcome into our ancient Tuscan farmhouse, nestled in the green Montagnola. 
 Each apartment is 70 m², two bedrooms, a bathroom, a lounge and a kitchenette. Inside there are chairs, sofas, satellite TV, cooking facilities, washing machine and cupboards.

place.name: La Colombaia
place.description: Apartment renovated in 2005, according to the traditions of Tuscany. With a magnificent view over the Chianti hills. Independent flat and tranquil, to arrangements which has a large garden, conservatory, swimming pool (open seasonally), solarium. An ideal place to relax and spend a nice holiday in Tuscany, is located a few km from the Fi-Si and close to major tourist attractions of the region: San Gimignano, Florence, Siena, Volterra ... "
